parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the task. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: FirstDateStr
parameters.description: The first time when the task is performed.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the scan interval. Valid values:

*   **day**: days
*   **hour**: hours

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The additional source for the task.

parameters.name: TargetEndTime
parameters.description: The time when the task ends. Unit: hours.

parameters.name: TargetStartTime
parameters.description: The time when the task is started. Unit: hours.

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description:
The name of the task. Valid values:

*   **VIRUS_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: virus scan task
*   **IMAGE_SCAN**: image scan task
*   **EMG_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: urgent vulnerability scan task

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   **VIRUS_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: virus scan task
*   **IMAGE_SCAN**: image scan task
*   **EMG_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: urgent vulnerability scan task
